div.head: 諸病
div.div: all diseases; all types of diseases

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: all diseases; all types of diseases

sense.def: Alternative Names zhu ji 諸疾 , all types of ailments; zhu zheng 諸證/諸症 , all types of [pathological] conditions. Combined Designation of all possible sub-classes of PC, and of all Pathological Condition in general. Different prefixes refer to the category of diseases referred to in specific, such as yan mu zhu bing 眼目諸病 , all diseases of the eyes; tai chan zhu bing 胎產諸病 , all diseases associated with pregnancy and delivery. Ling shu 靈樞 10: 為此諸病，盛則瀉之，虛則補之，熱則疾之，寒則留之，陷下則灸 之，不盛不虛，以經取之 , “For all these diseases [of qi abundance and depletion], in the case of abundance, drain it; in the case of depletion, supplement it; in the case of heat, make it move fast; in the case of cold, retain it. When it has sunk down, cauterize it; when there is neither an abundance nor a depletion, remove it from the conduits”.
